title: Notification system
notes: No ability to send notifactions for tasks that need to be completed soon

title: Priority levels
need: Reduce cognitive load and make task managment easier for individuals with a SR
notes: If tasks can not be ordered by priority important tasks can be buried under new tasks and forgotten about

title: Complexity levels
notes: If all tasks are presented in the same way users with cognitive disabilities may find it difficult to identify which tasks are simple and which are complex
